name: Surgical Precision
description:
Grants Hit +10 and Crit +10. When this unit's action restores HP to a unit, roll a critical hit (if attacking, use that crit roll); if successful, double the amount of HP restored and apply one of the following effects (player controlling that unit chooses):
•  Apply @{condition:Overheal:[Overheal]} to that unit for one turn equal to any excess healing.
•  Before HP is restored, end one or more conditions on that unit (player's choice).
•  Restore SP equal to half of any excess healing.
comment: Items in modifers can either be integers or string expressions
